title: jagattinai kAttiDum
sahitya:
jagattinai kAttiDu janArdanA Agamam pOTriDum Ananda rUpanE


anupallavi

  ihaparam iraNDilum pughal vEruNDO aham karaindazhaikkirEn Adari kaNNA


caraNam    karatalamanil kaDal nIr EndiyE kaliyuga muDivai kATTum kaNNA
 daraNiyil unadu pAdAmbujam tanaiyE taNNiya manattinil darikka varamaruL
